content: WANG Hai | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS WANG Hai Full-time Faculty Associate Professor of Information Systems Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, 2015 Teaching Topics Computer as Analysis Tool Decision Making under Uncertainty Smart City Operations Research Big Data and Entrepreneurship: Methodology and Case Studies Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to YANG Jingfeng Rajiv Ranjan KUMAR +65 68280088 haiwang@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceData Management & MiningDecision Making & OptimizationMachine Learning & IntelligenceLearning & WorkAnalytics & Decision SupportUrban & SustainabilityUrban Mobility & Smart EnvironmentUrban Logistics & Sustainability Strategic Priorities Sustainable Living
